text:
Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation Limited (Tangedco) would be conducting division level consumers’ grievances day meetings at the offices of Executive Engineer at the above mentioned dates.

The meetings would be held in Salem East - February 10 at 3 p.m. (0427-2241387, 94458-52310), Salem West: February 17 at 3 p.m. (0427-2270101, 94458-52320), Vazhapadi: February 20 at 11 a.m. (0429-2222210, 94458-52350), Salem South: February 24 at 3 p.m. (0427-2270280, 94458-52330) and Attur: February 27 (0428-2240861, 94458-52340),

a press release from R. Manivannan, Superintending Engineer, Salem Electricity Distribution Circle said.
title: Grievances redress meetings
